content:
I think that's a great start! It sounds like you have a good understanding of how to leverage social media personalities to reach your target audience. I'd be happy to help you brainstorm more ideas and provide guidance on how to execute your influencer marketing strategy.

What do you think about focusing on a specific theme or topic for your influencer marketing campaign? For example, you could focus on showcasing the benefits of industrial automation in a particular industry, such as manufacturing or logistics. Or, you could focus on highlighting the role of AI and machine learning in industrial automation.

Also, have you considered creating an influencer advisory board or council to help guide your influencer marketing strategy and provide feedback on your content and campaigns? This could be a great way to tap into the expertise and knowledge of influencers in your industry and get their input on what's working and what's not.

Let me know if you'd like to explore these ideas further or if you have any other questions or concerns!
